A mụrụ ya na South Africa, Michael Edward Bolus bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi nke biri na England n'afọ 1957 wee gụọ akwụkwọ na St Martin's School of Art site na 1958 ruo 1962, na-amụ ihe n'okpuru Anthony Caro
Mgbe o biri obere oge na Cape Town, ọ laghachiri London na 1964 iji malite ọrụ nkuzi na St Martin na Central School of Art and Design
Bolus nwere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na UK na Waddington Galleries na 1968, nke gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe ọkpụkpụ ya kemgbe ahụ.

nwa akwụkwọ, a na-emepụta ma ọ bụ kpụọ ọrụ mbụ ya na nkume, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, Bolus hapụrụ usoro ọdịnala ndị a iji jiri ígwè na aluminum rụọ ọrụ, ihe ndị nyere ya ohere ịchọpụta echiche nke nguzozi na ndọtị nke ọdịdị nke masịrị ya ogologo oge

Maka ihe ngosi Ọgbọ Ọhụrụ na 1965 ọ gosipụtara usoro ihe osise polychromatic na-ewere ụdị ọdịdị na-enweghị atụ nke e wepụrụ na aluminum, tinye ya n'ala ma ọ bụ guzo n'akụkụ. Ezigbo ihe atụ nke otu ọrụ a bụ, Bowbend, 1964.

N'afọ 1966, Bolus sonyere na ngosi "Primary Structures" na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ndị Juu na New York. N'otu afọ ahụ, e nyere ya ihe ngosi mbụ ya na America na Kornblee Gallery. N'afọ ndị 1970 ihe ọkpụkpụ ya hapụrụ ala, na-aghọwanye nkewa ma na-eji ihe owuwu lattice na grid-dị ka nke na-egbochi ike ndọda, dị ka Sculpture No
Bolus so n'ọgbọ nke ndị na-ese ihe nke ọrụ nke Julio González na Pablo Picasso mere kpaliri ma David Smith na Anthony Caro gaa n'ihu
Ọrụ nke ndị a na-ese ihe jụrụ oghere ahụ ma kwado ọrụ ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke ụwa kama ịpụ na ya
Ọ mụụrụ David Annesley, Tim Scott, William G
Tucker, Phillip King na Isaac Witkin
Ndị a na-ese ihe dọtara uche zuru oke na ngosi Ọgbọ Ọhụrụ na Whitechapel gallery nke London na 1965.
Bolus rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere Anthony Caro aka n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ ma bụrụ onye a na-ele anya nke ọma maka ikike ya iji ihe siri ike dịka ọla edo na ọla ọcha mee ihe.
